title: Bug 104630 - Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database in the Available Items sector of the software, the column icons do not appear.
EB: It is expected that when expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector, the table icons and column icons should be visible.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project. 
2. Create a new report. 
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source and connect it to a Derby database using the following information: 
 - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver 
 - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui 
 - User Name: root 
 - Password: root 
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
